title: [Self-Directed] Audio-Visual Learning Module for Strengthening Anatomy Practical Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of anatomical terminology and human body structures
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers to enhance anatomical structure understanding and practical skills. Delivered via mobile-optimized microlearning, emphasizing learning activities using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% accuracy in identifying key anatomical structures using DAVR materials before dissection practice.
Learners improve their understanding of dissection procedures by over 90% through DAVR.
Learners complete anatomy-related tasks in project-based assessments within 48 hours.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
